episode_event_salon_pasiosalon_date_ch03:
Carmine invited [Name:PlayerNickname ]
to go to a festival.
Hmm... Looks fun, I guess.

Pasio’s festivals have a nice vibe—though
not quite as good as Kitakami’s!
Hey, stop spacing out, would you?

You’re hanging out with someone as
good-looking as me—you should be having
way more fun!

Hmm... Pasio’s food stalls serve dishes from
all kinds of regions, huh.

See anything you want to try,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
(Say you want a candy apple.)

Hehehe... You’ve got kiddie taste buds,
just like Kiki!
(Say you want fried noodles.)
Oh, so you DO know what’s up!

Nothing says “festival” like a bunch of
super-salty fried food!
All right, my treat today!

Nope, not taking no for an answer! You’re
one of my grunts, and I feel like treating
you. Just enjoy it!
Come on—time for a little spending spree!

[Name:PlayerNickname ] enjoyed the
festival with Carmine all day.

Ah, we really did a lot today! I guess it
wasn’t such a bad day after all.
...What?
You...think I’m being nicer than usual?
Huuuh?! I’m ALWAYS nice!
Hmm... So that still wasn’t enough, huh...
Ah, don’t mind me! Just talking to myself!

Anyway, that’s it for today! You better show
up next time I invite you, too, OK?

Carmine invited [Name:PlayerNickname ]
to hang out again.
Like before, Carmine was unusually nice.

[Name:PlayerNickname ] couldn’t help but
ask why.
Why, you ask?

No big reason. I just thought it’d be cool to
hang out.

That look on your face... You don’t seem
convinced.
Ugh, fine! I’ll explain!
The truth is...

You’ve really helped me out since I came
to Pasio, [Name:PlayerNickname ].

You showed me around and helped me find
my feet.
But...

I didn’t want to keep feeling like I owed
you... That’s REALLY not my style!
So this is me paying you back, OK?
Don’t question it! Just let me be nice!
(Promise her you’ll have fun.)

Yeah, if I don’t see you smile, I’ll feel like I
still owe you something!
(Thank her.)

Hehehe, that’s more like it! It better be from
the bottom of your heart!
Ugh, come on! Just follow me already!
I’ve still got so many places to show you!
